scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:uat: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:uat" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
